data.title: Celery Diseases and their Management
data.meta_description: Celery ranks third among the worlďs salad vegetables in popularity. Grown primarily for its succulent leaf petioles, it is utilized in both fresh and processed forms. Celery seed is also popular for its tangy flavor. Celery has a relatively long production...
